prod_desc: Hop on, there’s so much to see with the LEGO® City bus!
prod_long_desc:
Join the other passengers for a quick and easy ride on the LEGO® City Bus. This cool model features opening front and side doors, a bike rack on the front, seats for minifigure riders, luggage storage space and room for a wheelchair inside, as well as a bus stop with a bike stand, trash can, waiting area and ramp, plus a newsstand with newspapers, fruit and drinks for sale. Includes 6 minifigures and a dog figure.
Build a busy Bus Station so your minifigures can travel the city streets and beyond!
Includes 6 minifigures: featuring a wheelchair passenger, plus a dog figure
LEGO City building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
City Bus measures over 2” high, 9” long, and13” wide. Bus Stop measures over 2” high, 3” wide, and 3” long
337 pieces – For boy and girls between the ages of 5 and 12 years old
